definitions.body: be turned, of cart wheel, c. [[עַל־]] upon, over; [[מוּסַבּוֹת דְּלָתוֹת]] Ez Eze 41:24 pt. appar. as gerundive, that can be turned, movable (Ges:§ 116 e; Co rds. ´[[חלעות מ]], cf. Toy:Hpt); [[שֵׁם]] ´[[מוּס]] Nu 32:38 turned (i.e. changed) as to name, but gloss, v. Di.
surrounded, i.e. set, of jewels (pt. cstr.) Ex 28:11, Ex 39:6, Ex 39:13 (all P).
